title: Vacuum Hero: Mafia Murder
description: Vacuum Hero: Mafia Murder is a casual game where you play as a little innocent robot vacuum cleaner that turns out to be a killing machine! You have to kill every single mafia in the room to pass the level. If they see the evil side of yours, they will chase and kill you! Move wisely and sneak into the hall, surprise and kill them in different ways. Vacuum all their money and run to the elevator. It is up to you whether you want to clean the murder mess or not! You can support the developer's social media channels onTwitterandYouTube.
